title.text: RFC 4603: Additional Values for the NAS-Port-Type Attribute

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                            G. Zorn
Request for Comments: 4603                                      G. Weber
Category: Informational                                        R. Foltak
                                                           Cisco Systems
                                                               July 2006
Additional Values for the NAS-Port-Type Attribute
contents.zh-CHS: NAS端口类型属性的其他值
关于下段备忘

contents.text: This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。
版权公告
版权所有（C）互联网协会（2006年）。
IESG注释

contents.text: This RFC is not a candidate for any level of Internet Standard. The IETF disclaims any knowledge of the fitness of this RFC for any purpose and in particular notes that the decision to publish is not based on IETF review for such things as security, congestion control, or inappropriate interaction with deployed protocols. The RFC Editor has chosen to publish this document at its discretion. Readers of this document should exercise caution in evaluating its value for implementation and deployment. See RFC 3932 for more information.
contents.zh-CHS: 本RFC不适用于任何级别的互联网标准。IETF不承认本RFC适用于任何目的的任何知识，特别注意到，发布决定并非基于IETF对安全、拥塞控制或与已部署协议的不当交互等事项的审查。RFC编辑已自行决定发布本文件。本文档的读者在评估其实施和部署价值时应谨慎。有关更多信息，请参阅RFC 3932。
摘要

contents.text: This document defines a set of values for the NAS-Port-Type RADIUS Attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了NAS端口类型RADIUS属性的一组值。
目录
1. 介绍

contents.text: This document defines a set of new values for the NAS-Port-Type Attribute [RFC2865].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档为NAS端口类型属性[RFC2865]定义了一组新值。
2. NAS端口类型值

contents.text: This document defines new values for the NAS-Port-Type Attribute. This specification concerns the following values:
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了NAS端口类型属性的新值。本规范涉及以下值：
30 PPPoA（ATM上的PPP[RFC3336]）
31 PPPoOA（ATM上的以太网PPP[RFC2516]
32 PPPoE（以太网PPP[RFC2516]以太网）
33 PPPoOVLAN（通过VLAN的以太网PPP[RFC2516]
34 PPPoEQ（通过IEEE 802.1Q的以太网PPP[RFC2516]
3. IANA考虑
3.1. 属性值

contents.text: This document is intended to act as a request for allocation of the numbers listed by IANA in the appropriate registry [RADTYP], according to the allocation policy given in [RFC3575].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件旨在根据[RFC3575]中给出的分配政策，作为IANA在相应注册表[RADTYP]中列出的号码分配请求。

contents.text: The values given have already been implemented by at least one vendor without assignment by IANA.
contents.zh-CHS: 给定的值已由至少一家供应商实施，且未经IANA分配。

contents.text: IANA has registered the numbers listed in Section 2, per this request.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已根据本请求登记了第2节中列出的编号。
4. 安全考虑

contents.text: This specification neither adds to nor detracts from the security of the RADIUS protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范既不增加也不降低RADIUS协议的安全性。
5. 工具书类
5.1. 规范性引用文件

contents.text: [RFC2865] Rigney, C., Willens, S., Rubens, A., and W. Simpson, "Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS)", RFC 2865, June 2000.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC2865]Rigney，C.，Willens，S.，Rubens，A.，和W.Simpson，“远程认证拨入用户服务（RADIUS）”，RFC 28652000年6月。

contents.text: [RFC3575] Aboba, B., "IANA Considerations for RADIUS (Remote Authentication Dial In User Service)", RFC 3575, July 2003.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC3575]Aboba，B.“RADIUS（远程认证拨入用户服务）的IANA注意事项”，RFC 3575，2003年7月。
5.2. 资料性引用

contents.text: [RADTYP] Internet Assigned Numbers Authority, "RADIUS TYPES", November 2005, <http://www.iana.org/assignments/radius-types>.
contents.zh-CHS: [RADTYP]互联网分配号码管理局，“半径类型”，2005年11月<http://www.iana.org/assignments/radius-types>.

contents.text: [RFC2516] Mamakos, L., Lidl, K., Evarts, J., Carrel, D., Simone, D., and R. Wheeler, "A Method for Transmitting PPP Over Ethernet (PPPoE)", RFC 2516, February 1999.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC2516]Mamakos，L.，Lidl，K.，Evarts，J.，Carrel，D.，Simone，D.，和R.Wheeler，“通过以太网传输PPP（PPPoE）的方法”，RFC 2516，1999年2月。

contents.text: [RFC3336] Thompson, B., Koren, T., and B. Buffam, "PPP Over Asynchronous Transfer Mode Adaptation Layer 2 (AAL2)", RFC 3336, December 2002.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC3336]Thompson，B.，Koren，T.，和B.Buffam，“异步传输模式适应层2（AAL2）上的PPP”，RFC 3336，2002年12月。

确认
